p: The anti-inflammatory potential of whole plant alcoholic extract was explored and found to be more significant than the standard hydrocortisone drug, owing to the presence of steroids ( 176). In another study, rats were injected with 3.5% formalin in hind leg footpads which reduced glucose absorption in the jejunum. The plant extracts maintained the absorption of glucose at normal levels while producing anti-inflammatory effects ( 177). A group studied the effect of aqueous root extract of W. somnifera, and glucosamine sulfate on nitric oxide-induced cartilage damage in chronic osteoarthritis patients. It was revealed that the extract significantly lowered nitric oxide release in patients ( 178).
